sourcesContent:
import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/styles';
const useStyles = makeStyles({
    title: {
        fontFamily: 'DinProRegular',
        fontSize: 20,
        fontWeight: 'bold',
        fontStretch: 'normal',
        fontStyle: 'normal',
        lineHeight: 1.3,
        letterSpacing: 'normal',
        color: '#222222',
        marginBottom: 36,
    },
    description: {
        fontFamily: 'Arial',
        fontSize: 16,
        fontWeight: 'normal',
        fontStretch: 'normal',
        fontStyle: 'normal',
        lineHeight: 1.75,
        letterSpacing: 'normal',
        color: '#333333',
        marginBottom: 24,
    },
    disclosure: {
        fontFamily: 'Arial',
        fontSize: 14,
        fontWeight: 'normal',
        fontStretch: 'normal',
        fontStyle: 'normal',
        lineHeight: 1.57,
        letterSpacing: 'normal',
        color: '#777777',
        marginTop: 16,
        marginBottom: 24,
    },
});

export default useStyles;
